column1:
shakespeare-much-ado-t-shirt,,Default,configurable,"Default Category/Literature & Philosophy,Default Category/History & Politics",base,Shakespeare (Much Ado),"

This T-shirt design honors William Shakespeare who is without a doubt (in my mind) the most influential and talented writer that ever lived. Born over 450 years ago, William Shakespeare produced more than 35 plays, many of which are still famous today. He was extraordinary at introducing new words &
column2: phrases into the English language with thousands of words and phrases credited to Shakespeare that have no written references before he had penned them. There are many quotes from shakespeare's plays and I have chosen my favourites to form a series dedicated to Shakespeare.

column1:
There are 23 designs in this series.
Here are the plays I have chosen, (click on the name of the play to see that design):
&bull
column2:
All's Well That Ends Well
&bull
column27:
Twelfth Night

The main design features the
column30:
The Worlds a stage, and all the men and women merely players. They have their exits and their entrances, and one man in his time plays many parts...""

",,,1,Taxable Goods,"Catalog, Search",,,,,shakespeare-much-ado-t-shirt,Shakespeare (Much Ado),Shakespeare (Much Ado),

This T-shirt design honors William Shakespeare who is without a doubt (in my mind) the most influential and talented writer that ever lived. There are many quotes from Shakespeare's plays and I have chosen my favourites to form a series dedicated to Shakespeare. so take a look and choose your favourite.
